Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.Listeners.GameHandlingListeners

Interface GameHandlingListener

All Superinterfaces:
Listener
All Known Subinterfaces:
GeneralListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
GameSelectionController, TUIView
public interface GameHandlingListener extends Listener
Classes that implement this interface are going to receive updates about game handling events

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    notify(GameHandlingEvents type, List<String> varArgs)
    This method is used to notify listeners that an event regarding game handling has happened.
    void
    notify(String errorDescription)
    This method is used to notify errors to GameHandlingListener

  • Method Details

    • notify

      void notify(GameHandlingEvents type, List<String> varArgs)
      This method is used to notify listeners that an event regarding game handling has happened.
      Parameters:
      type - the GameHandlingEvents type of the event
      varArgs - variable String arguments

    • notify

      void notify(String errorDescription)
      This method is used to notify errors to GameHandlingListener
      Parameters:
      errorDescription - a String description of the error
